tech.title: Skills and Tools
tech.subtitle: Here are the technologies I used to build the project

content1.title: About Me
content1.text: I'm Muhammad Daffa Fauzan, a Full-Stack Web Developer experienced in Laravel, Node.js, Vue.js, and React.js. I'm an expert in large-scale and efficient web application development with a strong emphasis on backend architecture, API integration, database management, and user-friendly UI/UX design. I have a great passion for learning existing web technologies, and I love to write clean, readable code and system optimization. My projects encompass medical record systems, online shopping websites, and online registration systems, which are all built following clean architecture principles and best practices. I have a great passion for facing new challenges and for continually enhancing my technical expertise.

items-works.name: Developed an odontogram medical record application, increasing patient record efficiency by 30% and speeding up medical record access for medical staff.
Built an e-commerce website, achieving a 25% increase in transaction conversion by prioritizing secure payment gateway integration and improving user experience.
Implemented Laravel to create a scalable backend and efficient database handling using MySQL.
Maintained the university database, achieving a 40% increase in the accuracy of alumni data through digitization of hard copies.
Developed a web-based attendance application with Node.js, reducing attendance recording time by up to 50% from the previous system.
Implemented secure coding best practices, enhancing system security and database efficiency.
